author: stoddard
msg: Bail on computing the amount of bytes in a brigade if any of the buckets
have indeterminate length (e.g., a pipe bucket). Passing an invalid length
into mod_mem_cache can cause it to overflow its cache buffer.

author: stoddard
msg: mod_cache tweak to make it HTTP/1.1 compliant
